SneakAttack.title: Sneak Attack
SneakAttack.description: When attacking unaware targets, add 2x Stealth modifier to the attack roll. On a successful hit, multiply the damage dealt by (level +1), after rolling damage and applying all modifiers.

BloodMagic.title: Blood Magic
BloodMagic.description:
Once per watch per level, deal damage to self (damage dealt = potency) to choose one of the following effects:
REND - potency x d6 damage to visible targets, hits automatically
MEND - Add a +potency bonus to any check before rolling
AID - potency x d4 healing to non-sorcerer
MAX POTENCY: Level + 3

CombatReflexes.title: Combat Reflexes
CombatReflexes.description: Roll initiative 2x and use the best result.

BattleIntuition.title: Battle intuition
BattleIntuition.description:
Usable once per combat at level 1, twice at level 3, three times at level 7.
Pick one of these two effects each use:
MIGHTY BLOW - One of your attacks auto hits and deals + level damage
MIRACULOUS ESCAPE - One attack auto misses you, after it is rolled, before damage is rolled.
